TopicTitle: The list of mission ideas! (Get Ideas/Post Ideas here!)

Articles.Content:
Here people can get ideas for missions, if they run out! Feel free to post ideas and i'll add them on the list!

List:

Make a Laythe Colony.

Make a Duna refueling station.

Land a B-Class astroid (Or bigger) on top of the VAB.

Colonize an E-Class astroid in LKO. (Extra: After you colonize it with 20 Kerbal capacity, send it on escape trajectory.)

Set up a coms unit around Kerbin. (One unit is 20 satellites). (Extra: Launch a unit in one launch.)

Put a space station in Kerbin stationary orbit. It must have 10 kerbals.

Put a Space station in orbit around Tylo with 15 Kerbal capacity. It must have one orange tank of fuel and a largo mono-propellent tank.

Impact Kerbol.

Explore Easter Eggs.

Put a boat on Laythe or Eve.

Do a multiple planet flyby (The voyagers).

Visit an astroid, don't redirect it, and come home.

Edited January 20, 2015 by DMSP

Capture an asteroid and land it on top of the VAB.

Then colonize it.

Make a Duna refueling station.

I actually started that yesterday. Not much of a refueling station yet, but it will get there eventually...

Set up comm sattelite constellation around kerbin (I probably won't be doing this anytime soon as I don't run remotetech, but the idea remains on the books)

Large space station in kerbin-stationary orbit, about a quarter planet ahead of the KSC (so somewhere around the horizon when viewed from KSC). This would act as a refuel and crew rotation outpost for large, re-usable interplanetary vessels. Would hold crew quarters, a lof of fuel tanks and a lab + a battery of small MkI capsule return-to-Kerbin pods so you can easily return sience to Kerbin and reset the science equipment on the docked ships. These can also act as escape pods in case of emergency.

Large, re-usable interpletary motherships. These would be capable of transporting a large amount of kerbals (20-40) for colony rotation, as well as have a ton of science equipment and a complement of around 6-9 docked probes/sattelites. Would also have their own dedicated landers/crew transports to bring crew to and from colonies on the planets below.

Redirect a class E astroid to Kerbin or Munar orbit and colonize it (probably Munar orbit for me as I'm already planning to have the big staging area space station for kerbin)

Not sure about this one yet: colonise class E asteroid, send it to interplanetary space on a circular orbit around Kerbol (probably somewhere between Dres and Jool or something). Could act as staging area and general deep-space stand-alone colony. This would take a HELL of a lot of fuel though. Or hyperedit.

General space stations in the Jool system, Laythe being the obvious primary candidate. Floating base would be amazing, but I'm not sure if I would be able to pull it off and crew rotation would be really difficult.... Unless of course you build a transport boat and build the base close to shore...

Refuel station in high Jool orbit seems like a no-brainer.

Edited January 15, 2015 by Cirocco

Refuel station in high Jool orbit seems like a no-brainer.

Refuel station between Vall and Tylo is very practical if you do not use resource utilization mods. You can bring fuel and life supplies (if you use such a mod) with huge >100 t tanker spacecrafts and distribute it for smaller landers. If Station have a tug ship it can bring Laythe and Tylo ascent modules from low orbits and get them or men and science back to the Station. If you use life support and extra room for pilots, you can park large interplanetary crew ships with many hitchickers and life supplies for years to Station too and let Kerbals use smaller ships for investigate moons.
Wow, So many ideas I might have to make individual categories for each different type of idea! (Stations, Astroids, Exploration missions, Etc.)
